org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 AbstractCheckpointStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.AbstractCheckpointStats
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    CompletedCheckpointStats, FailedCheckpointStats, PendingCheckpointStats

    public abstract class AbstractCheckpointStats
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base class for checkpoint statistics.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) long checkpointId
      ID of this checkpoint.
      (专用程序包) int numberOfSubtasks
      Total number of subtasks over all tasks.
      (专用程序包) CheckpointProperties props
      Properties of the checkpoint.
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      (专用程序包) java.util.Map<JobVertexID,TaskStateStats> taskStats
      TaskStateStats accessible by their ID.
      (专用程序包) long triggerTimestamp
      Timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered at the coordinator.

      构造器和说明

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract long getAlignmentBuffered()
      Returns the total buffered bytes during alignment over all subtasks.
      java.util.Collection<TaskStateStats> getAllTaskStateStats()
      Returns all task state stats instances.
      long getCheckpointId()
      Returns the ID of this checkpoint.
      long getEndToEndDuration()
      Returns the duration of this checkpoint calculated as the time since triggering until the latest acknowledged subtask or -1 if no subtask was acknowledged yet.
      abstract SubtaskStateStats getLatestAcknowledgedSubtaskStats()
      Returns the latest acknowledged subtask stats or null if none was acknowledged yet.
      long getLatestAckTimestamp()
      Returns the ack timestamp of the latest acknowledged subtask or -1 if none was acknowledged yet.
      abstract int getNumberOfAcknowledgedSubtasks()
      Returns the number of acknowledged subtasks.
      int getNumberOfSubtasks()
      Returns the total number of subtasks involved in this checkpoint.
      CheckpointProperties getProperties()
      Returns the properties of this checkpoint.
      abstract long getStateSize()
      Returns the total checkpoint state size over all subtasks.
      abstract CheckpointStatsStatus getStatus()
      Returns the status of this checkpoint.
      TaskStateStats getTaskStateStats(JobVertexID jobVertexId)
      Returns the task state stats for the given job vertex ID or null if no task with such an ID is available.
      long getTriggerTimestamp()
      Returns the timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getStatus

        public abstract CheckpointStatsStatus getStatus()
        Returns the status of this checkpoint.
        返回:
        Status of this checkpoint

      • getNumberOfAcknowledgedSubtasks

        public abstract int getNumberOfAcknowledgedSubtasks()
        Returns the number of acknowledged subtasks.
        返回:
        The number of acknowledged subtasks.

      • getStateSize

        public abstract long getStateSize()
        Returns the total checkpoint state size over all subtasks.
        返回:
        Total checkpoint state size over all subtasks.

      • getAlignmentBuffered

        public abstract long getAlignmentBuffered()
        Returns the total buffered bytes during alignment over all subtasks.

        Can return -1 if the runtime did not report this.

        返回:
        Total buffered bytes during alignment over all subtasks.

      • getLatestAcknowledgedSubtaskStats

        @Nullable
public abstract SubtaskStateStats getLatestAcknowledgedSubtaskStats()
        Returns the latest acknowledged subtask stats or null if none was acknowledged yet.
        返回:
        Latest acknowledged subtask stats or null

      • getCheckpointId

        public long getCheckpointId()
        Returns the ID of this checkpoint.
        返回:
        ID of this checkpoint.

      • getTriggerTimestamp

        public long getTriggerTimestamp()
        Returns the timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered.
        返回:
        Timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered.

      • getProperties

        public CheckpointProperties getProperties()
        Returns the properties of this checkpoint.
        返回:
        Properties of this checkpoint.

      • getNumberOfSubtasks

        public int getNumberOfSubtasks()
        Returns the total number of subtasks involved in this checkpoint.
        返回:
        Total number of subtasks involved in this checkpoint.

      • getTaskStateStats

        public TaskStateStats getTaskStateStats(JobVertexID jobVertexId)
        Returns the task state stats for the given job vertex ID or null if no task with such an ID is available.
        参数:
        jobVertexId - Job vertex ID of the task stats to look up.
        返回:
        The task state stats instance for the given ID or null.

      • getAllTaskStateStats

        public java.util.Collection<TaskStateStats> getAllTaskStateStats()
        Returns all task state stats instances.
        返回:
        All task state stats instances.

      • getLatestAckTimestamp

        public long getLatestAckTimestamp()
        Returns the ack timestamp of the latest acknowledged subtask or -1 if none was acknowledged yet.
        返回:
        Ack timestamp of the latest acknowledged subtask or -1.

      • getEndToEndDuration

        public long getEndToEndDuration()
        Returns the duration of this checkpoint calculated as the time since triggering until the latest acknowledged subtask or -1 if no subtask was acknowledged yet.
        返回:
        Duration of this checkpoint or -1 if no subtask was acknowledged yet.
